title: Login Theme Playlist?

replies.body:
Riot maintains a playlist on youtube on their official channel. Sometimes it's missing the most current one (such as right now, it doesn't have Taric's), but generally it's pretty up to date.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2Ncmjy-HaeA&list=PLbAFXJC0J5GZHUtGea_zQR0OyD3UBuw9s

If you open that video on youtube you'll see it's the first in a big playlist of them all.

Hey Archmare,

SoundCloud should have most of our login screens for you to listen to!

[https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends)
